articles.title: First Ariane 6 launch set for July 9 - SpaceNews
articles.description: The European Space Agency and its partners have announced a July 9 launch date for the first Ariane 6 rocket.
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. The European Space Agency and its partners have announced a July 9 launch date for the first Ariane 6 rocket.
